page.title: 04HOME LIFE -THREE
page.content:
We asked people in our area how they heated their home. Over three-quarters of people replied that they used Gas, either as Gas Central Heating or Gas fires. The rest were evenly divided between coal and electric. It was interesting to see that nobody used oil.We decided that this was probably because of the great increase in its price over the last ten years. We thought the reasons so many people used Gas are because it was the cheapest, -the price has increased recently since most people had it installed - and it is very clean.
.
